title: あなた“と”輝くステージで

text.jpText:
みんなでグランドライブの意味を
突き詰める中。これまでの活動を見てきた
ファンから、手伝いを申し出る声が上がる。
text.enText:
While we are all trying to figure out the 
meaning of the grand live. Having seen the 
activities to date A fan offers to help.

text.jpText:
ファンの話を聞いて、ライトハローは閃く。
ライブでファンが自由に声を出す形を提案し、
出演者には彼らの声を聞いてほしいと頼んだ。
text.enText:
After listening to the fans, Light Halo was 
inspired. She proposed a form of live 
performance in which fans would be free to 
make their voices heard, and asked the 
performers to listen to their voices.

text.jpText:
メンバーはステージ上で、浴びるように
“想い”を受け取った――ファンにも、
彼女たちに伝えたい想いがあったのだ。
text.enText:
The members received "feelings" on stage as 
if they were being showered with them―the 
fans also had feelings they wanted to convey 
to the girls. The fans also had their own 
feelings they wanted to convey to the girls.

text.jpText:
その光景を目の当たりにしたライトハロー。
ファンのためにも『グランドライブ』は
必要だと確信し、再建すると決意した。
text.enText:
The light halo is a sight to behold. For the 
sake of the fans, "Grand Live" was She was 
convinced that it was necessary and decided 
to rebuild it.
